benchmark_details.name: Orak
benchmark_details.overview: Orak is a foundational benchmark for training and evaluating LLM agents across diverse video games, focusing on 12 popular titles from various genres.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Establish a foundation for building gaming agents and evaluate LLMs on realistic decision-making tasks.

data.source: Expert LLM gameplay trajectories across 12 popular video games

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on gameplay metrics and interactions with the game environment.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better agent performance and more effective gameplay strategies.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted across diverse games with various LLMs to validate effectiveness.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The benchmark includes various demographics through the selection of diverse games, ensuring a wide representation of gameplay experiences.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Users must purchase commercial games for evaluation and must not redistribute any game assets.
